Reviews.Content: This is very nice tablet and works great for the price it is unbelievable!I love it. Love all the apps..it is very easy to use even for me a first time tablet owner....Instructions are not good....so I just played with it figured everything out.

Reviews.Title: charger stop working early and the storage space stinks
Reviews.Author: Amor
Reviews.Content: i am having too many problems with this tablet. the couple apps that came with the tablet seem to be the only ones that can be on the tablet without a problem....even when you buy extra memory.

Reviews.Title: It worked great at first
Reviews.Author: Amanda Farinas
Reviews.Content: It worked great at first but after a few weeks the charger port didnt work right and the tablet didnt run that fast I guess its worth the amount paid for it. the warrenty isnt good either.

Reviews.Title: Disppointing
Reviews.Author: drgnfly1169
Reviews.Content: I got this as my first tablet and can say I am quite disappointed.  I have had it about three weeks and am shopping for a new tablet now, trying to resell this once I get a replacement charger cord.  The first few days I was satisfied however once I used it a bit more, it seemed to all go downhill.  One of the problems is the strange size.  If you want a case for it, good luck!  It's wide but narrow, couldn't find anything close.  Finally settled on a Kodak 8" tablet case but the tablet sticks out a half inch on each side width wise.Response time seems very slow and the screen freezes constantly.  Several times it just shut down and reset itself while I was in the middle of something.  I can understand this sometimes but I have probably used it about 30-40 hours total and it's done it about a dozen times.Currently it is useless to me.  The plug on the AC/DC charger is so thin, my dog bumped my arm while it was charging and it snapped in half.  Only replacements come from China, searched everywhere local and find nothing compatible.  So, after I wait a few weeks, I will have a charger.  There is a mini USB but when you plug it in, you can't charge it that way.  I would not suggest wasting your money on this.

Reviews.Title: Poor product
Reviews.Author: schmsu
Reviews.Content: Right from the beginning we ordered a new tablet.  The package came looking like a refurbished tablet.  The tablet would power up and for the first few uses we could get online and use it.  After a couple days, the tablet would power up but not go past the Android screen.  We were very disappointed in the product.  Amazon has a great return policy so it was easy to send back.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Power Plug
Reviews.Author: John M. Wells
Reviews.Content: The tablet works OK.  The keyboard is difficult to use because the capacative screen is not very precise, so when you type you often get the letter next to the letter you touch.  The tablet lags a little on every task.  Even typing has a noticable delay on every stroke.  Internet is slow on wifi, has b/g wifi, but not the newer and faster n.  This is what I expected for the price.  It is certainly not an iPad, but it costs much less.The odd problem is that the tablet arrived with a charger with two round prongs that will not fit in a United States power plug.  I think this power plug is made for China.  If you are not in China, be aware that you might need to find a power adapter, which works out to more hassle and cost.

Reviews.Title: Tursion 7" Tablet
Reviews.Author: I. Rosado
Reviews.Content: Tablet looks good and solid when you first touch it. Understand that you get what you pay for and I was looking at this as a tablet to play with before I decide to get a 10".  The overall response of the apps is okay but mostly slow.  The touch screen has to be mashed down solidly for it to respond, except oddly enough when you play games.  As for the browser, it is very frustrating, very very slow response, and I am just feet away from my router!  So, keep it as a first trial but do not make it you main purchase once you get into the tablet world.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality no response from customer service
Reviews.Author: maddad
Reviews.Content: My daughter saved up to buy this item and we had no way  to contact customer service except email.  No response after several attempts.  Initial problem was unit was stuck in chinese mode with no easily apparent way to switch to english.  With no success with customer service I figured out myself at long last.  Manual is useless.  After that battery failed to take a charge (less than 6months old).  GAve up on unit and this company.  Very disappointed daughter....this company should be ashamed to offer a product like this and have such horrible customer support.  My daughter is out her hard earned money she saved up for this.

Reviews.Title: Good if worked for more than one month
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J Ogren
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son. It worked very well when we first got it.  I have 4 kids and they have had Nexus, Samsung and Acer tablets. This tablet was a replacement for a Nexus when the screen craked on the Nexus. It had a  fairly responsive touch screen and the wifi worked well. Having the SD expansion slot was a plus. I was beginning to think we had found a great value. Then the charger would not work. Bought a replacement charger and it did not work. Occassionally the screen would flicker for a second or two.  The back of the tablet  would become extremely hot when trying to charge. Ended up sending it back. Luckily I used credit card award point to pay for it so it was only 30.I think with these low price tablets, you are more likely to have hardware issues. . We had a second low end tablet and the same thing happened with the charger. Luckily the problems all occurred within 30 days and we could get refunds. If you order one of the lower end tablets you are taking bigger risk.  If you get one that works they are great.

Reviews.Title: Screen was defective upon first use
Reviews.Author: Bradley T
Reviews.Content: I read reviews on this product from amazon.com as well as other independent sites before purchasing based on price range. Unfortunately the item I received had a defective screen. All I could see were striped lines of color - no graphics and no clear bright screen.The printed directions are vague, brief and essentially not helpful.Maybe I got the lemon?

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: charlie9999
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and when we got it it looked good and worked but it only lasted a couple days and the problems started. It had too many to list. I did not have any problems returning it for a refund. I would not recomend this brand. Purchase a brand you have heard of before.

Reviews.Title: 7" Tursion tablet
Reviews.Author: tammy
Reviews.Content: Didn't work from the time I received it. I had to send back. I had to cancel extended warranty that I purchased with it.

Reviews.Title: Beware of this product and Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet in Sept as a Christmas present so it was after the "30 days" that my daughter rec'd it and we found it is defective.  The tablet works well as far as browsing and easy to operate, however the camera on it is upside down.  The main reason we got it was so she could do apps like snapchat which was impossible with a defective camera.  The software needs an update to possible re-orient the camera.  I contacted Amazon just after Christmas to let them know that it was a gift and was defective and they said send it back for a refund.  After they rec'd the item I rec'd an email from Amazon saying I only got a partial refund due to a "re-stocking" fee.  It listed that the reason for refund was "customer return" not "defective".  So some other lucky person will be receiving a defective tablet because it was re-stocked.  Very disappointed with this whole experience and the product.  If you order a product such as this please please make sure you do not purchase it early as a gift because you will be screwed.  The only thing good I guess I can say is at least I got a little bit back.....

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Marcos Best
Reviews.Content: Screen started messing up the day i got it so i had to return it the next day. Waste of time and money.

Reviews.Title: yuck
Reviews.Author: tiffi
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very slow and lacks greatly in the responsive category. Was very disappointed when i bought 2 of these as christmas gifts

Reviews.Title: UGH...Horrible Wifi and Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This tablet was my 10 year old daughters Christmas present and since powering the tablet on for the first time it's been nothing but a headache! Unfortunately this is the second Tursion that's been sent to me in a month. The product box was smashed and the screen was shattered when I opened the first one. When I recieved the replacement tablet and had seen the box was smashed again I was very disapointed. Thankfully there was no evident damage to the tablet this time.The other reviews about this tablet not getting/keeping a strong wifi connection are absolutely true!! I've tried in mulitple locations and my daughter prays that she can play a whole (2 min) game before the connection kicks her off again.I wish the wifi was the only problem! I'm still researching the camera problem, but you could just as well be looking through night vision goggles when taking a picture! Needless to say this is not a quality product!  I just wanted to get a serviceable tablet for my daughter without breaking the bank. Yes, it's true...CHEAPER ISN'T ALWAYS BETTER!!I am going to upgrade to a better tablet as long as this seller on Amazon with replace it!!

Reviews.Title: A waste of money and time. :-(
Reviews.Author: Ted L Williams
Reviews.Content: Product was VERY slow and would not let me download anything at all or even recognize my SD card.  Sad!

Reviews.Title: Slow browers
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Saddler
Reviews.Content: My computer and laptop both work faster than this thing. All the browers are slow. Tlhe  maps and locators are fast, so this problem doesn't make sense.

Reviews.Title: I believe it is the wrong product
Reviews.Author: A. Jordan "ajordanrt"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for one of my twins, the black and the white...the white came in a completely different box but I did not think anything about it.  Well they opened it Christmas Morning and as of today December 29th the white one will no longer hold a charge.  I am very unhappy, of course I purchased them in September so they can no longer be returned....The black one is working fine but it also arrived in an android box and with android instructions...How do you have one twin that has a tablet and the other one doesnt, and you dont have the money to purchase another

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: ctj
Reviews.Content: It tore up a week after I got it.it will not work at all.i am verry disappointed.I thought it would be better quality.

Reviews.Title: Touchy screen
Reviews.Author: Kevin Densmore
Reviews.Content: I'm used to keyboards that type a single character per keypress. This tablet would type three, four or more characters per keypress, which made it completely unusable and frustrating. Plus they sent it in the wrong color. I do not recommend this product at all.

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Abigail Bronowski
Reviews.Content: This tablet was horrible. Was always shutting down on me, auto correct didn't work right and this tablet is NOT worth the money. Spend the extra money for somethin better like Samsung Galaxy 2. Bought one after I dealt with  this crappy tablet and I am much happier with the Samsung.

Reviews.Title: will not stay charged
Reviews.Author: melas mom
Reviews.Content: got this for my little girl for her birth day i decided to put some games on it before i gave it to her. put it on the charger till full and took it off was happy about the look because lets face it for 84$ i thought the deal was great but YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR im downloading the games for her and 10 min into it i look at the battery and its at 40% so i think maybe i thought i plugged it in and didn't so i closed all apps and put it on the charger one more time and took it off the battery displayed full and i just left it off did not turn on any app and 10 min latter battery life if at 50%  and the WiFi will not stay on and the screen started freezing up all in one day! im so upset now my little girl wont have a tablet that she wanted on her birth day do not get this tablet its a wast of time and money if i could have gave it no stars i would have

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste Your Money
Reviews.Author: Rochester Reviewer
Reviews.Content: First one lasted less than three months before it would not charge or power up.  When it was working, getting it to connect to WiFi was rare.  Bought a second one to replace the first and it was dead out of the box.  Returned it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Crappy quality
Reviews.Author: MartinKalashnikov
Reviews.Content: If you think that this tablet at around $70-$80 seems too good to be true; then you're right on the money in assuming that it is.  I will give the company props for running what seemed to be stock ICS without any additional odd "features" like some of the other cheap Android manufacturers (here's looking at you LG!) but he hardware was absolutely atrocious in quality.  The battery would completely die at anywhere from 10-30%; no warning, so if you were in the middle of say, writing your thesis on Microbiology with Kingsoft Office, you would totally lose all of your work.Additionally, the screen seemed very cheap and flimsy, sometimes when holding the back of the tablet with a firm grip, I would notice my finger made a mark on the screen, which sometimes the tablet's interface recognized as a tap and would initiate some other part of a program.  Very annoying. Occasionally buttons seemed to want to press themselves and do very strange things.  No idea why, but I'm sure it had something to do with the lovely quality of that screen.There was also an odd rattle inside the tablet, never did figure out what was just hanging loose in there; but needless to say, I returned it and spent the extra $100 and got a Nexus 7.  And I totally recommend that you do the same.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEVICE, GREAT PRICE!!!
Reviews.Author: BP
Reviews.Content: AFTER READING THE REVIEWS, SOME POSITIVE AND SOME NEGATIVE, I DECIDED TO TAKE A CHANCE AND ORDER THIS TABLET FOR MY GRANDSON. I HAVE TO ADMIT THAT I AM VERY IMPRESSED. THE INSTRUCTIONS ARE HARD TO FOLLOW SO I HAVE TO KIND OF GUESS THERE WAS NO DIAGRAM FOR THE BUTTONS.  I HAD DECIDED THAT I WOULD TRY THE DEVICE TO MAKE SURE THAT IT WAS IN GOOD WORKING CONDITION BEFORE GIVING IT TO MY GRANDSON FOR CHRISTMAS. ONE OF THE REVIEWERS SAID THAT HIS DEVICE CAME FULLY CHARGED UT OF THE BOX. THIS ONE DID NOT. THE INSTRUCTIONS SAID A FULL CHARGE TAKES ABOUT SIX HOURS. THIS ONE WAS FULLY CHARGED AFTER TWO HOURS. THE SCREEN IS CLEAR AND FUNCTIONS WITH SLIGHT TO MODERATE TOUCH AND IS EASY TO READ. DID NOT HAVE TO CHANGE THE FONT AND THAT WAS A SURPRISE BECAUSE I USUALLY HAVE TO CHANGE TO FONT ON MY COMPUTER AND MY KINDLE SINCE I WEAR GLASSES. IT IS LIGHT ANS EASY TO HANDLE. IT LOOKS LIKE I SET THE TIME AND DATE WITH EASE. COMES WITH SOME APPS AND I DID NOT TRY TO DOWNLOAD ANYTHING. WILL LEAVE THAT TO GRANDSON. SOUND APPEARS TO BE GOOD. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS DEVICE.  I THINK THAT SOME OF THE NEGATIVE REVIEWERS WERE EXPECTING MORE THAT THEY SHOULD FOR UNDER ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS. I KNOW THAT MY GRANDSON WILL BE VERY EXCITED ON CHRISTMAS MORNING WHEN HE OPENS THIS GIFT. I AM GOING TO ORDER ONE FOR MYSELF. IT WILL BE MY FIRST TABLET. I AM A GRANDMA AND NOT VERY TECH SAVVY BUT I THINK THAT I WILL ENJOY THIS LITTLE DEVICE. NOTE: ORDERED AT AMAZON. I ALSO ORDER A COBY TABLET FOR ANOTHER GRANDSON AND WILL DO A SEPARATE REVIEW ON THAT ONE. I REALLY FEEL THAT IT IS MONEY WELL SPENT!!! ALSO IT ARRIVED IN TWO DAYS IN PERFECT CONDITION, NICELY PACKED.  WILL UPDATE THIS REVIEW AFTER GRANDSON HAS HAD IT FOR A COUPLE OF MONTHS.UPDATE: AFTER WORKING WITH THIS TABLET FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS, I FIND THAT IT IS AWFUL! MY INITIAL REVIEW WAS WRITTEN BEFORE I HAD A CHANCE TO ACTUALLY USE THIS PRODUCT. I CAN'T GET IT TO DO ANYTHING AFTER THAT FIRST DAY. CAN'T ACCESS EMAIL. IT SHUTS OFF FREQUENTLY, WHEN I FINALLY GOT TO THE KEYBOARD, IT WAS NOT WORKING PROPERLY. FOR EXAMPLE IF I TYPED A P, IT SHOWS AN O. ABSOLUTELY NOTHING WORKS ON THIS TABLET. MY FIRST REVIEW WAS PREMATURE. I RETURNED IT YESTERDAY!!!

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Olano
Reviews.Content: You can do many things with it.The first thing I watched was the price.... wifi, android. It's a good price!I don't know what type of external keyboard I can use with it. I would like to know that.Its good to count with all of that.Yes, of course. I do recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Carla C. Robertson
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money purchasing this item. I bought this tablet and it worked for approximately 3 weeks. It did not turn on again. I did not get my money back.

Reviews.Title: Works but very slowly
Reviews.Author: Chupathingy
Reviews.Content: Tablet works, but is extremely slow.  Brings back memories of my 386 with windows 3.1 and dial up internet.  Build quality is good, screen looks good and is responsive but it is painfully slow with anything else.  If you use the tablet while it is plugged in the screen responsiveness is terrible.  Has google play store but will NOT play netflix.  I am returning and will pay more to get a dual core processor, I think these days it's a necessity for a phone or tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great...until you drop it
Reviews.Author: Kayke
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet just over 2 weeks ago to be able to read my textbooks on the go. Everything was perfect. Runs smoothly with Andriod 4.0. This was until tonight when I dropped it from 2 feet onto linoleum flooring. The screen shattered. Back light still turns on but screen is completely nonfunctional. Kicking myself right now for not getting a case sooner. So all in all great software, cheap hardware = great price, just make sure to order a case when you buy it.

Reviews.Title: no wi-fi
Reviews.Author: marayzl
Reviews.Content: It would not find any wi-fi networks.  Very little instructions included and poor phone support. Would not purchase this tablet.Returned it

Reviews.Title: A few bugs, but worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: It looked great, powered up fast but the touch screen was so defective I could not do anything at all with it.UPDATE .... After some frustration I was able to turn the pointer speed down to its lowest setting and now it is working great. It seems the touch screen on the one I got is hyper sensitive. It down loaded apps and installed them faster than my Galaxy S2 ever has.

Reviews.Title: Not enough Instructions
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: The instruction to this product is very little and vague. I know it has a lot of features, but it doesn't give you enough instruction. On some of the features there is no instructions at all.It only has 4 little page of instructions and that's about it. If someone who is new to this kinda devices, like myself, I would definitely like more in debt instructions on I can get the most usage out of this device.

Reviews.Title: Wont turn back on
Reviews.Author: GG
Reviews.Content: Stopped working already! Just won't turn on! i am so disappointed! Bought cehap brand since it was for my son. learnt my lesson well!

Reviews.Title: Ok, if you don't need Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: observer "Al"
Reviews.Content: I had to return this tablet after 7 days. The tablet could not connect to the internet within 2 feet from the router. I bought this tablet for limited use, mainly to watch video during traveling and occasional browsing. Video app worked OK.

Reviews.Title: Deceptive advertisement
Reviews.Author: nonon
Reviews.Content: Item received is only 2 GB not 4 GB as described on the ad, also it doesnt have a USB connection as pictured.. I consider it a deceptive advertisement due to above reasons. I also noticed that the item seemed to have been previously used and probably was previously returned due to scratches found on the touch screen plastic.

Reviews.Title: i wish i could leave zero stars
Reviews.Author: Ashley L. Hoganson
Reviews.Content: slowslows l owi cant wait to return this slow machine,pdf dont even workfirst tablet ever made

Reviews.Title: Great at first
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: For the first couple of weeks the tablet worked great. Now apps are shutting off with no warning. When you're in the middle of a game it will just close. I have another tablet that I payed a lot more for and it has worked great for several months now. I would use the money to put toward a better tablet.

Reviews.Title: confused
Reviews.Author: ladiwolf "ladiwolf"
Reviews.Content: this thing does not work. i even paid for  an sd 16 card for itevery time i try to do something it goes back to the settings page.i accidently threw the box away and am not sure if i can return it but i will be talking to amazon rr this verrry unhappy

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Lilid
Reviews.Content: Don't purchase from this seller!there is no wifi connection,and there is only 4 gb of memory,not 8gb as was described. And finally tablet isn't loading,I can't turn it on!I could not return this tablet,I lost my money,and I threw this tablet because their technical support even didn't help me.Horrible service!!!This was my second order from Value Max,with problems again, first time they sent me different tablet,not that I ordered...

Reviews.Title: Fastastic Tablet Only for a Day
Reviews.Author: Adam Ali
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet and was pleased with it. It had said HDMI output but theres no Hdmi on it. tablet worked fine for a day then it froze and now its stuck at the android screen and wont come on. Wonderful tablet for the time I had it working. Pretty fast and works nice.

Reviews.Title: Nasty little tablet
Reviews.Author: Martin Blecha "Simple Country Bear"
Reviews.Content: Received this unit and set it up per the very poorly-written instruction booklet.  Could not get it to work, eventually got it to read one (1) story, although it froze up 10 times during the story.  Got an assortment of blue screens, freeze ups and many other frustrations.  This unit is a total disappointment.  I'm sorry that I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Another piece of Chinese junk
Reviews.Author: jz
Reviews.Content: I returned it.  What else is there to say?  The touch screen was unresponsive, and that was just the beginning

Reviews.Title: cerwin2
Reviews.Author: cerwin2
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!! Deplorable item!!!!!  I am amazed that amazon supports this company as much as they do because it is essentially buying a fake hand bag in Europe only the bag doesn't say Prada and when you buy the bag you walk away and it rips open and you find out that is just a plastic bag that looks nice.  This was a horrible product.  I understand that you get what you pay for, but the only reason why I got tablet is for application development.  But the Android Software that is on it is fake, it is not the real Android software it has been edited by someone in China.  It is so full of bugs that after my first day of playing with it, it started to get so bad that I needed to reboot and set it do the default settings.  Still it would act buggy.  For basic operations it failed.  This item should not be supported by amazon from what I saw many people had problems with this tablet, and the problems ranged from everything to everything except for the look.  Just save time and money and go buy a nexus 7 tablet, or get a kindle fire or a nook and root them to run google android on them.AWFUL ITEM.Returned the next day of buying it.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: Warning! Don't buy this tablet. I bought this tablet and thought it was ok in the beginning. It got the games I wanted but the internet was slow. I thought it was an ok tablet for its price. I have had it for about 1 month and 2 weeks now. Today I tried to turn it on and it wouldn't start. I charged it and it still didn't start. It's completely dead! I would return it but its past the return date. I am planning on trying to see what kind of help amazon will provide. I just wasted $80 and that's a lot to me since I'm 14 years old and payed for this tablet with my own money. If you buy this tablet you are wasting your money.

Reviews.Title: Very slow tablet it freezes up.
Reviews.Author: Endia
Reviews.Content: I wiah i can get my MONEY BACK  do not keep charg  and very little space on the tablet do not have anything download

Reviews.Title: Tursion Tablet
Reviews.Author: Beck
Reviews.Content: When I opened the box the screen was scratched on the tablet.  So I boxed it up and returned it immediately.  Never tried to use it.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Jose Francisco
Reviews.Content: hello. I would like you to please review the physical and technical condition of system operation to avoid a hard time and to continuing our business relationship in the long term

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "sarge96"
Reviews.Content: I bought this inexpensive tablet for my daughter.  I didn't want to spend too much since she is only 9 years old and can't do much more than play a few games, take some pictures and maybe get on the web a little.  I purchased this one specifically b/c it had most of the things that I was looking for including Google Play store already installed.Well, you do get what you pay for.  The first day I got it, I tried getting some things installed and realized that if you have the tablet plugged in, the touchscreen comes alive...by this I mean that no matter what you are trying to select, it selects something else.  I finally unplugged it and it seemed to be fine.Within a week, the tablet had locked up and would not work.  We have now returned it to Amazon and are awaiting our refund.The worst part is that this was a gift for my daughter's 9th birthday and now she'll have to wait till I can afford a better tablet b/c I don't want her to have to go thru this again.

Reviews.Title: Bad..
Reviews.Author: Viktor
Reviews.Content: This tablet is super slow. the video chat isnt good it lags.. the camera gives bad quality pictures.Im not happy with it at all it also dies quickly and doesnt charge while is on DO NOT BUY IT!~

Reviews.Title: you get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: robert lee samuelson
Reviews.Content: this junk froze on flashing android after less than 2 months. i could never get it to load my netflix account. the manual is virtually useless as it is mostly unintelligible. about the only use i got out of this was playing the preloaded solitaire. i'll never make the mistake of buying anything from tursion again. where i was initially very satisfied with my amazon purchasing experience, the past four months has been a disaster of undelivered,defective or incorrect orders.

Reviews.Title: Wifi problems with 4.0.4
Reviews.Author: Papa007
Reviews.Content: This tablet seems decent on the outside, but once you start downloading anything, it gives authentication errors with the wifi no matter how much you try to connect/reconnect.  The first thing I did when this started was reset the tablet back to factory settings, hoping that factory settings would be in the flavor of 4.0.3 or earlier.... no such luck.  Now i'm stuck trying to figure out how to roll this thing back to 4.0.3 or update the wifi driver.... which is what I suspect is causing the issue.Hopefully the manufacturer is reading this and can provide a bit of insight on where I can find these files.

Reviews.Title: Get what you paid for!!
Reviews.Author: Electronic Fan
Reviews.Content: Screen is cloudy and dull, not LCD or LED screen or anything.  I played around with it for couple of hours and got bored of looking at the dull screen.  Will never buy any electronic stuff that is made in China.  I wouldn't take this product for free, that's how bad it is.  Just remember, YOU GET WHAT YOU PAID FOR!  $90 I thought was a steal, haha, boy was I wrong.  Anyway I will return the product ASAP.  Buyers beware.....I am warning all buyers about the dull screen!!

Reviews.Title: help
Reviews.Author: bobbianne1
Reviews.Content: these 2 items do not go together fix my problemi will be waiting to hear from someone to fix this  they do not connect together why did you put this as a package deal?

Reviews.Content: ok they say would be able to used video chatting weird coz i can see my chatmate on video mine doesnt work any help..plz or should i return it instead?? everytime i try it just went off and my charger doesnt work right need need help:(

Reviews.Title: garbage
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: This listing is full of deception. Its advertised as a multi core processor. It is not. Only single core. Also its advertised as having a HDMI output. It does not. Many of the games my son wanted will not work at all. SAVE YOUR MONEY DO NOT BUY!

Reviews.Title: I Like It But......
Reviews.Author: Asia J. Collier "Asia Ja'net"
Reviews.Content: I just purchased the Tursion Tablet and I Love It already but I cant connect to any Wifi connections in the area... None really pop up and if they do they are locked.. I cant access Google Apps/Market etc.... What should I do.. Any alternative ideas?

Reviews.Title: Typical android junk
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: I bought this pad for one simple task... play audio through the headphone jack to my car's Aux input. EPIC FAIL.Pros: Decent price at $85Cons:When plugged in to charge the keyboard types garbage charactersThe headphone jack does not keep contact so has to be pushed back in frequentlyAs for android... typical junk. Requires frequent rebooting, renders itself useless if downloading and installing, incompatible with Netflix, can't uninstall junk apps like Facebook. Did I mention you have to reboot a lot? I'm surprised Norton doesn't report android as a virus.
